videoData.title: Why I ask strangers to draw their memories
videoData.socialTitle: Why I ask strangers to draw their memories

nodes.whoTheyAre: Janne Willems is the founder of the international social art project Seize Your Moments.

videoData.description: For her social art project, Seize Your Moments, artist Janne Willems approaches strangers and asks them to draw beautiful moments from the past week on postcards. So far, Willems has collected nearly 11,000 drawings from 30 different countries. In her endearing talk, Willems shares a moving selection of intensely personal treasured moments from her travels.
videoData.socialDescription: For her social art project, Seize Your Moments, artist Janne Willems approaches strangers and asks them to draw beautiful moments from the past week on postcards. So far, Willems has collected nearly 11,000 drawings from 30 different countries. In her endearing talk, Willems shares a moving selection of intensely personal treasured moments from her travels.
